name: Kashish...
greetingText: or kaju, or golu, or whatever but tbh I like aayat the most!
wishText: May this website always be with you! :) but wait....
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Yee tum jiyo hajaro saal Many many blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do...
text4: I realised, Being a coder I wanted to do something
outroText: Umm bs yhi boluga ki u can talk to me when ur heart is heavy.. u can come to me when ur thoughts r loud.. Please never be afraid to talk about ur problems u wont annoy me infact thodi der ke liye hi sahi but tumse baat karke me apni life ki hjaro problems bhul jata hu
replayText: And if tomorrow we dont talk Again, protect what we shared, Also treat people with kindness nd respect ur elders (chahe wo apse 2 saal hi bda kyu na ho!) And anyways don't be a stranger again Kashish :) Or hn logo ke kapde faadna or ankhien nochna bnd kroðŸ˜‚
